product_description.usage: Mortar cement is used in producing masonry mortars for brick, block, and stone masonry units. It is recommended for load-bearing walls and can also be used to produce stucco.
product_description.composition: Portland cement, plasticizers, ground limestone, and air entraining additives.
product_description.types: Conforms to ASTM C1329 for Type N, S, or M.

installation.preparatory_work: Mix in accordance with ASTM C270. Machine mixing recommended.
installation.batching_sequence: Add 3/4 of mix water, 1/2 sand, 1 bag of cement, then remaining sand and water.
precautions: Do not change sand sources or mixture proportions.
Do not use other additives or admixtures.
Do not use acid-based cleaning solutions.
installation.safety_precautions: Consult Safety Data Sheet. Avoid skin contact. Use PPE.
installation.storage_and_handling: Store above ground on pallets, covered with tarps or polyethylene sheeting.
